content:
{"name": "NW Community Food", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- We are a food pantry that distributes fresh fruits and vegetables, household cleaning items, personal hygiene items, and canned/boxed foods. Based on donations from local businesses, we also try to distribute milk and cheese, baked goods, meats, and ready-made meals.  

**We give out food and cleaning items every Sunday from 1 to 3 pm, rain or shine. If pantry guests arrive at 2 pm, the line is shorter and there still is plenty of food. We are open on holidays. 

- For people who are unable to visit the pantry in person due to disability, we deliver groceries to homes during  weekends. This depends on how many volunteer drivers we have. 

- We are located behind the building at 4340 Connecticut Ave NW, Washington, DC. We are a block north of the Van Ness Metro station on the Red line on the west side.

**People can text or call NW Community Food at (202) 743-5770. Our website is: https://nwcommunityfood.net. ", "email": "", "url": "https://nwcommunityfood.net/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4340 Connecticut Avenue Northwest", "address_2": "Back of building", "city": "Northwest Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20008", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9462842, "longitude": -77.06512099999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 555-5555", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Client choice pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}]}
